h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: The second bell can be found in Bamboo Grove. Start from the Snake Trail Keepers Shrine and take the stairs up and go across the bridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 2'.
The content is as follows:
The second bell can be found in Bamboo Grove. Start from the Snake Trail Keepers Shrine and take the stairs up and go across the bridge.
